mapper.select: SELECT a.tag_id, a.tag FROM tb_tags a JOIN tb_posts_tags b ON a.tag_id = b.tag_id WHERE b.post_id = #{postId}
SELECT a.tag_id, a.tag FROM tb_tags a WHERE a.tag_id = #{tagId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_tags WHERE tag_id NOT IN ( SELECT tag_id FROM ( SELECT a.tag_id FROM tb_tags a JOIN tb_posts_tags b ON a.tag_id = b.tag_id GROUP BY a.tag_id ) AS t )
